definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
to enjoy the benefits of the hard work of one's predecessors. (idiom)
pinyin: qian2 ren2 zai1 shu4 , hou4 ren2 cheng2 liang2

sentences.english: Inherits people of the past's theory more and say the nourish the spirit develops a mature stage.
sentences.chinese: 韩愈继承前人学说，把养气说发展到成熟阶段。

sentences.english: He is always looking for composition in predecessors.
sentences.chinese: 他总是前人的画作里寻找构图。

sentences.english: In the Past , Au - bearing character was never researched to Jiao-Lai basin.
sentences.chinese: 胶莱盆地含金性前人未作研究。

sentences.english: Instead seek inspiration from those before you and the world around you.
sentences.chinese: 用前人的创造和你身边的东西取代苦苦探寻灵感。

sentences.english: These two aspects were unprecedented views worthy of further research.
sentences.chinese: 这两点都是发前人所未发，值得进行深入探讨。

sentences.english: The former researchers have already done some researches about the mold-making techniques of the bronze-jia.
sentences.chinese: 关于斝的铸造工艺，前人也曾做过一些相关研究。

sentences.english: For the alchemists and the Six Dynasties'novels, previous studies have been on a lot.
sentences.chinese: 对于方士和六朝小说，前人已有很多的研究论著。

sentences.english: He followed the theory of his predecessors while combining it with the spirit of the new era.
sentences.chinese: 他祖述了前人的理论，同时结合了新时代的精神。

sentences.english: The Raman spectrum of L-alanine has been measured by many authors.
sentences.chinese: 前人的工作详细研究了L丙氨酸晶体的拉曼光谱。

sentences.english: To boldly go where no man/one has gone before.
sentences.chinese: 勇敢地航向前人所未至的宇宙洪荒。

sentences.english: Predecessors are not afraid to blood, could their descendants be afraid to sweat?
sentences.chinese: 前人不怕多留血，后人哪怕多流汗？

sentences.english: And they were considered to be from migmatization of the Dabie Group.
sentences.chinese: 其成因前人认为是大别群经强烈混合岩化作用的结果。

sentences.english: Due to the limited data, the predecessors' researches are not very satisfactory.
sentences.chinese: 由于资料的缺乏，前人对张赓研究不足。

sentences.english: This thesis will, based on the previous study, give a real picture of Qiu chi fron many aspects.
sentences.chinese: 本文将在前人基础上，对丘迟做一较为全面的研究。

sentences.english: He was the first to accomplish something that others before him had failed to do.
sentences.chinese: 他是首位达成这件前人都未竟全功的事的人。

sentences.english: Many scholars have already made good use of the epitaphs in the researches on Tang poets.
sentences.chinese: 利用墓志，研究唐代诗人，前人也做过许多研究。

definition: worthy predecessor/distinguished person of the past/former sage
people from ancient times/the ancients/the late (i.e. person who has passed away)
to pick up what others say (idiom); to pass off other people's opinions as one's own/to parrot
to follow old patterns/to imitate existing models/to continue along the same lines
stick-in-the-mud/to stick to old ways/stubbornly conservative
to continue the same old routine/to carry on just as before/to procrastinate
junior scholar or pupil in imperial China
to elucidate/to expound/to study and explain
